verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] been officially nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize for his work to end the Korean War and bring together the leaders of South and North Korea .
President Donald Trump has [V: been] officially nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize for his work to end the Korean War and bring together the leaders of South and North Korea .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump] has been [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: nominated] [ARG2: for a Nobel Peace Prize] [ARGM-CAU: for his work to end the Korean War and bring together the leaders of South and North Korea] .
President Donald Trump has been officially nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize for his work to [V: end] [ARG1: the Korean War] and bring together the leaders of South and North Korea .
President Donald Trump has been officially nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize for his work to end the Korean War and [V: bring] [ARG3: together] [ARG1: the leaders of South and North Korea] .
